translations: v.为……举行就职典礼；为……举行落成仪式；开创，开展

phrs.translation: 开始, 使就职, 举行就职典礼, 开创
举行就职典礼, 为…举行开幕典礼, 开始, 使正式就任
表演开始时拉开舞台前的幕

sentences.sentence: Afghanistan is due to inaugurate a parliament.
sentences.translation: 阿富汗将举行新议会典礼。

sentences.sentence: Q: the 8th China-ASEAN Expo will inaugurate tomorrow. Please brief us on the attendance of ASEAN leaders.
sentences.translation: 问：第八届中国-东盟博览会将于明天开幕，请介绍东盟国家政要出席情况。

sentences.sentence: In 1971, invited to inaugurate the International Year for Action to Combat Racism, levi-strauss gave a lecture entitled Race and Culture.
sentences.translation: 1971年，列维·斯特劳斯应邀出席反种族主义国际行动年启动仪式，并发表了题为《种族与文化》的演讲。
